creator: apache@andy-t.org
text:
In the directory http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/, you have duplicate CURRENT 
entries:
CURRENT-IS-2.2.4
CURRENT-IS-2.2.6

This confuses software that checks for updates.

Thanks,

Andy

Solved this morning, but updates only happen once a week.

Closing as fixed, you should discover this is true at this time, tomorrow.

Thanks for the pointer.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Justin points out that I miskeyed the answer

updates happen hourly, removals occur once per *day* (not week).

Again, thanks for raising the flag on this mistake.
